overview: Detective Sathyabhama is a crime thriller movie directed and music scored by Navaneeth Chary. The movie casts Sonia Aggarwal, Ravi Varma, Bigg Boss fame Saikumar Pampana, Suneetha Pandey are in the lead roles. The music was composed by C Sathya while cinematography and editing were done by Lucky Ekari.
title: Detective Sathyabhama
